page.description: Converts a color name to a hex value.

argument.name: name
argument.description: The color name to convert. If *[xb:<showcolors>]* is specified as the *[xb:name]*, a list of color names is returned.

return.name: Result
return.description: Returns the hexadecimal value for the specified color. Returns a list of colors if *[xb:<showcolors>]* was specified.

discussion.p: The *[xb:convert_color_name_to_hex()]* function returns the hexadecimal value for a named color.
To get a list of supported colors, call the function with *[xb:<showcolors>]* specified as the *[xb:name]* argument. For example:

p.example: ? convert_color_name_to_hex("<showcolors>") = aliceblue antiquewhite aqua aquamarine azure beige bisque black blanchedalmond blue blueviolet brown ...
